text: The Montaigu Tournament (In French: Tournoi de Montaigu) is an international association football competition that is contested by under-16 national teams. The tournament is also known as Mondial Minimes. The games are held in stadiums located in the Vendée department of France. The final is played at the Stade Maxime Bossis in Montaigu. ==History== The tournament was founded in 1973 by Dutchman, André Van Den Brink who was the president of FC Montaigu, a French amateur football team. ==Previous winners== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%; width:65%; text-align:left;" !width="10%"| Year !width="22%"| Winner !width="22%"| Runner-up !width="22%"| Third place !width="22%"| Fourth place |- |align=center| 1976 | | Eintracht Frankfurt | Ajax Amsterdam |rowspan=38| |- |align=center| 1977 | | | |- |align=center| 1978 | | | |- |align=center| 1979 | | | |- |align=center| 1980 | | | |- |align=center| 1981 | | | |- |align=center| 1982 | | | |- |align=center| 1983 | | | |- |align=center| 1984 | | | |- |align=center| 1985 | | | |- |align=center| 1986 | | | |- |align=center| 1987 | | | |- |align=center| 1988 | | | Atlantic Selection |- |align=center| 1989 | | | |- |align=center| 1990 | | | |- |align=center| 1991 | | | |- |align=center| 1992 | | | |- |align=center| 1993 | | | |- |align=center| 1994 | | | |- |align=center| 1995 | | | |- |align=center| 1996 | | | |- |align=center| 1997 | | | |- |align=center| 1998 | | | |- |align=center| 1999 | | | |- |align=center| 2000 | | | |- |align=center| 2001 | | | |- |align=center| 2002 | | | |- |align=center| 2003 | | | |- |align=center| 2004 | | | |- |align=center| 2005 | | | |- |align=center| 2006 | | | |- |align=center| 2007 | | | |- |align=center| 2008 | | | |- |align=center| 2009 | | | |- |align=center| 2010 | | | |- |align=center| 2011 | | | |- |align=center| 2012 | | | |- |align=center| 2013 | | | |- |align=center| 2014 | | | | |- |align=center| 2015 | | | | |- |align=center| 2016 | | | | |- |align=center| 2017 | | | | |- |align=center| 2018 | | | | |- |align=center| 2019 | | | | |- |align=center| 2020 |align=center colspan=4|Future event |} ==Most successful teams== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
